get.summary: Get the status information of a TiCDC node

output-raw-change-event.description: OutputRawChangeEvent controls whether to split the update pk/uk events.

partition.description:
PartitionRule is an alias added for DispatcherRule to mitigate confusions.
In the future release, the DispatcherRule is expected to be removed .

output-raw-change-event.description: OutputRawChangeEvent controls whether to split the update pk/uk events.

advance-timeout-in-sec.description:
AdvanceTimeoutInSec is a duration in second. If a table sink progress hasn't been
advanced for this given duration, the sink will be canceled and re-established.

content-compatible.description: ContentCompatible is only available when the downstream is MQ.

enable-kafka-sink-v2.description: EnableKafkaSinkV2 enabled then the kafka-go sink will be used.

table_ids.description: Table list, containing tables that processor should process

force_replicate.description: if true, force to replicate some ineligible tables

timezone.description: timezone used when checking sink uri

table_ids.description: All table ids that this processor are replicating.

boundary_ts.description:
if the operation is a delete operation, BoundaryTs is checkpoint ts
if the operation is an add operation, BoundaryTs is start ts

admin_job_type.description: used for admin job notification, trigger watch event in capture

start_ts.description: Start sync at this commit ts if `StartTs` is specify or using the CreateTime of changefeed.

target_ts.description: The ChangeFeed will exits until sync to timestamp TargetTs

enable_table_across_nodes.description:
EnableTableAcrossNodes set true to split one table to multiple spans and
distribute to multiple TiCDC nodes.

region_threshold.description: RegionThreshold is the region count threshold of splitting a table.

write_key_threshold.description: WriteKeyThreshold is the written keys threshold of splitting a table.

do_dbs.description: DoDBs is an allowlist of schemas.

do_tables.description: DoTables is an allowlist of tables.

ignore_dbs.description: IgnoreDBs is a blocklist of schemas.

ignore_tables.description: IgnoreTables is a blocklist of tables.

table_ids.description: All table ids that this processor are replicating.

checkpoint_interval.description:
The maximum interval between latest checkpoint ts and now or
between latest sink's checkpoint ts and puller's checkpoint ts required to reach synced state

synced_check_interval.description: The minimum interval between the latest synced ts and now required to reach synced state

database_name.description: Schema is the name of the schema (database) containing this table.

table_name.description: Name is the unqualified table name.
